Value: ABx Group Limited engages in the exploration, development, and production of bauxite resources in Australia. It holds interests in 10 bauxite tenements covering an area of approximately 321 square kilometers located in New South Wales, Queensland, and Tasmania; and Bald Hill bauxite mine project at Campbell Town in northern Tasmania. The company was formerly known as Australian Bauxite Limited and changed its name to ABx Group Limited in December 2021. ABx Group Limited was incorporated in 2009 and is based in Sydney, Australia.
